net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps
Class DirVector

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.DirVector

public class DirVector
extends java.lang.Object

Struct to keep track of velocities. Represents a velocity or acceleration vector, not a point. Vector is overloaded enough already!
